name: Red
traits: Brave, compassionate, clever, cautious yet curious, determined
background: A young girl living with her mother near the edge of a mysterious forest; deeply loves her grandmother and wants to prove her maturity
motivation: To help her ailing grandmother, prove her bravery, and ultimately protect her family

name: Red's Mother
role: Red’s caretaker; provider of warning and basket
background: A single mother who has experienced the dangers of the woods firsthand; responsible for both Red and the safety of the family home
motivation: To ensure her daughter’s and mother’s safety, to teach Red caution and responsibility

name: Grandmother
background: An elderly woman living alone in a cottage deep in the woods; has a close bond with her granddaughter Red
motivation: To survive her illness and the Wolf’s attack, to be reunited with her family

name: The Wolf
background: A dangerous creature known to lurk in the woods; skilled in trickery and disguise, infamous for targeting travelers
motivation: Driven by hunger and the thrill of the hunt; seeks to outwit and consume both Red and her grandmother
